name: GhostShi
description:
Ghostshi

A mini-game made by two ametuers for the LowRezJam2016 https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2016

Pusty & Jun

Controls:

A - move left

D - move right

W - move up (use the ghost ability first)

S - move down (use the ghost ability first)

SPACE - lets you jump

E - interact

left arrow - shoot (needs to charge)

right arrow - ghost ability (go through brown placeholder walls)

P - pause

Github
